code.value:
# from langflow.field_typing import Data
from langflow.custom.custom_component.component import Component
from langflow.io import MessageTextInput, Output
from langflow.schema.data import Data


class CustomComponent(Component):
    display_name = "SCL + Feauture concatenation"
    description = "Use as a template to create your own component."
    documentation: str = "https://docs.langflow.org/components-custom-components"
    icon = "code"
    name = "CustomComponent"

    inputs = [
    DataInput(
        name="dataframe_content",
        display_name="SCLs",
        input_types=["DataFrame"],
        required=True,
        is_list=True
    ),
    DataInput(
        name="dataframe_feature",
        display_name="Features",
        input_types=["DataFrame"],
        required=True,
        is_list=True
    )
]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Modified Frame", name="results", method="build"),
    ]

    def build(self) -> DataFrame:
        content_df = pd.concat(self.dataframe_content)
        feature_df = pd.concat(self.dataframe_feature)
        
        #content_df["identifier"] = content_df["file_path"].apply(lambda x: x.split("_")[-1].replace(".pdf", ""))
        #content_df["identifier"] = content_df["file_path"].replace(".scl.txt", "")
        content_df["identifier"] = content_df["file_path"].apply(lambda x: x[x.find("GE"):].replace(".scl.txt", ""))
        feature_df["identifier"] = feature_df["file_path"].apply(lambda x: x[x.find("GE"):].replace(".feature.txt", ""))
        
        content_df = content_df.merge(feature_df, on="identifier", suffixes=["_content", "_feature"])
    
        return content_df
